# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $14,000 for this exceptional item. This price reflects not only its high quality but also the significant impact it could have on your operations. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
